content: reaper leviathan crochet pattern is in english and us terms with pictures and detailed instructions the skill level recommended for this pattern is advanced requires 4mm us size g crochet hook yarn needle fiberfill stuffing crafting wire for bendable skeleton i used 16 gauge 2 pairs of eyes - 14mm and 10mm plastic eyes for amigurumi dark gray yarn 20-25 yards red yarn 40-45 yards white yarn 90-100 yards the yarn measurements are for worsted weight medium #4 yarn which is what i used for the reaper in pattern this pattern can be made in different yarn but you will need to adjust hook and plastic eye s size note if this pattern is made with bulky yarn or thicker the reaper leviathan will become very large 2+ feet long this pattern requires some sewing for assembly
